Title: Late Afternoon in the Garden of Bob and Louise
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Jon Schroeder, Jim Dauterive (creator)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: In order to become a member of the community garden, Bob must give Louise's enemy a job.
